channel.title: Hugo Future Imperfect
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Future Imperfect

item.title: Why Go ?
item.description: For me it makes no sense to talk about why a decision has been made without any context. So I will try to give some context on what was happening when we decided to give Go a shot. We started to work at Neoway with the Go language for a year and a half right now, and on this post I will try to pass on some of the experience of learning Go.

item.title: Having fun with Go's nil, interfaces and errors
